common.error_friendly: Something went wrong. Please check your connection and try again.
common.ai_limit_daily_desc: You have reached the daily limit of {limit} uses for this feature. Please come back tomorrow to continue.
common.ai_limit_weekly_desc: You have reached the weekly limit of {limit} uses for this feature. Please come back next week to continue.

login.subtitle: Log in or create an account to start your health journey.
login.terms_privacy: By continuing, you agree to our <1>Terms of Service</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

onboarding.toast_error: Error saving profile. Please try again.

gender.title: What is your gender?
gender.description: This helps us calculate your nutritional needs more accurately.

age.title: How old are you?
age.description: Age is a key factor in determining your basal metabolic rate (BMR).

experience.title: Have you used nutrition apps before?
experience.description: This helps us tailor the complexity of the app.
experience.first_time: No, this is my first time

metrics.title: Your current measurements
metrics.description: We need your current weight and height to calculate your BMI and goals.

motivation.title: What motivates you the most?
motivation.description: Knowing your motivation helps us keep you focused.
motivation.healthier: To be healthier and prevent diseases
motivation.energy: To have more energy throughout the day
motivation.feel_better: To feel better about myself and my body

goal.title: What is your main goal?
goal.description: We will calculate your daily calorie and macro needs based on this.

goal_weight.title: What is your goal weight?
goal_weight.description: We will track your progress towards this goal.
goal_weight.disclaimer: You can change this goal at any time in the settings.

weekly_rate.title: How fast do you want to achieve it?
weekly_rate.description: A safe and sustainable rate is recommended for long-term success.
weekly_rate.fast_desc: Fast rate. Requires high discipline and may be harder to sustain.
weekly_rate.slow_desc: Slow and steady rate. Highly sustainable and minimizes muscle loss.
weekly_rate.balanced_desc: Balanced rate. Effective and manageable for most people.

final.title: Ready to start?
final.description: Calorel uses AI to help you achieve your goals faster and more sustainably.

timeline.reminder_desc: We will send you a reminder before the trial ends.
timeline.billing_desc: If you don't cancel, the subscription will begin.
timeline.cancel_note: Cancel anytime before Day 7 to avoid charges.

buttons.no_payment_note: No charge for the first 7 days.

generating_plan.step3: Generating your first week's meal plan...
generating_plan.step4: Plan ready! Redirecting to your dashboard.

home.title: Dashboard
home.goal_achieved_toast: Great! Based on your rate, you should reach your goal weight around {date}.
home.start_logging: Tap the '+' button to log your first meal or exercise.

scanner.error_camera_desc: Please grant camera permissions in your device settings.
scanner.help_desc: Point the camera at your food. Ensure good lighting and a clear view of the entire dish for the best nutritional analysis.
scanner.flash_unavailable: Flash/Torch is unavailable on this device or camera.

analysis.default_reason: Analysis based on visual estimation and common portion sizes.

manual_food.title: Manual Food Entry
manual_food.desc_placeholder: e.g., Large portion with vinaigrette dressing
manual_food.error_analysis: Failed to analyze food. Please check the description.

exercise.title: Log Exercise
exercise.subtitle: Choose how you want to track your activity.

running.title: Running / Cardio
running.intensity_low_desc: Light effort, easy to maintain a conversation.
running.intensity_high_desc: High effort, difficult to speak more than a few words.

weights.title: Strength Training
weights.intensity_low_desc: Focus on high reps, low weight, or light stretching.
weights.intensity_high_desc: Heavy lifting, high effort, long rest periods.

write_exercise.title: AI Exercise Analysis
write_exercise.placeholder: Describe your workout. E.g., 'I ran for 45 minutes at a moderate pace' or 'I did 1 hour of heavy weightlifting.'
write_exercise.example: The AI will estimate the calories burned based on your description and profile.

manual_exercise.title: Manual Calories
manual_exercise.validation_error: Please enter a valid calorie amount.

progress.title: Progress
progress.subtitle: Track your journey and celebrate your achievements.
progress.weight_progress_no_data: Not enough data to display the chart.
progress.weight_progress_start_logging: Log your weight regularly to see your progress.

bmi_calculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmi_calculator.incomplete_data: Complete your height and weight in settings to calculate your BMI.
bmi_calculator.tooltip: The Body Mass Index (BMI) is a measure used to screen for weight categories that may lead to health problems. It is calculated by dividing weight by the square of the height. It is an estimate and should not be used as the sole indicator of health.

streak_modal.title: Daily Streak!
streak_modal.subtitle: You've logged food or exercise for {streak} consecutive days. Keep up the great work!

badges.title: Achievements
badges.subtitle: Unlock badges by achieving milestones in your health journey.

streak_1.name: First Log
streak_1.desc: Log your first meal or exercise.

share.meal_message: ¡Acabo de analizar mi {food} con Calorel! Mira mi nutrición.
share.badge_message: ¡Acabo de desbloquear el logro '{name}' en Calorel! A celebrar.

diets.title: Planes de Dieta
diets.subtitle: Explora planes de dieta personalizados generados por IA.
diets.regenerate_dialog_desc: Generar un nuevo plan consumirá uno de tus usos semanales de IA. ¿Estás seguro de que quieres continuar?
diets.gap_time_message: Es hora de descansar. ¡Recuerda mantenerte hidratado y prepararte para tu próxima comida!

diets_onboarding.title: Plan de Dieta Personalizado
diets_onboarding.subtitle: Responde algunas preguntas para generar tu plan de comidas semanal a medida.
diets_onboarding.step_country_desc: Esto ayuda a la IA a sugerir ingredientes locales y accesibles.
diets_onboarding.country_expansion_note: Actualmente, ofrecemos sugerencias de cocina local para estos países. Si el tuyo no está en la lista, selecciona 'Estados Unidos' para una dieta occidental general.
diets_onboarding.step1_desc: ¿Qué tan activo eres en una semana típica?
diets_onboarding.step2_desc: Selecciona cualquier restricción o preferencia dietética.
diets_onboarding.step3_desc: Cuéntanos sobre tus hábitos de cocina y presupuesto.
diets_onboarding.generating_step2: Adaptando el plan a la cocina local en {country}...
diets_onboarding.generating_step2_generic: Adaptando el plan a la cocina occidental general...
diets_onboarding.generating_step4: Finalizando la estructura de comidas semanal...

settings.title: Ajustes
settings.subtitle: Gestiona tu perfil, objetivos y preferencias.

deleteDialog.title: ¿Estás absolutamente seguro?
deleteDialog.description: Esta acción no se puede deshacer. Esto eliminará permanentemente tu cuenta y todos tus datos, incluidos registros y progreso.

nutritional_goals.title: Metas Nutricionales
nutritional_goals.subtitle: Ajusta tus objetivos diarios. Los cambios se guardan automáticamente.

ai_suggestions.disclaimer: La IA utilizará esta información para calcular tus objetivos óptimos de calorías y macros.

ring_colors.title: Colores de Anillos
ring_colors.subtitle: Entiende lo que significa cada color en tus anillos de progreso diario.
ring_colors.green_desc: Estás dentro del 10% de tu objetivo (o lo has superado de forma segura).
ring_colors.yellow_desc: Estás entre un 10% y un 20% por encima de tu objetivo (ej. demasiadas calorías).
ring_colors.red_desc: Estás más del 20% por encima de tu objetivo, indicando un exceso significativo.
ring_colors.dotted_desc: No hay datos registrados para este día aún.

request_feature.title: Solicitar una Función
request_feature.subtitle: ¡Ayúdanos a mejorar Calorel!
request_feature.description: Vota por funciones existentes o sugiere una nueva. Las más votadas son priorizadas.

new_request_drawer.title: Sugerir una Nueva Función
new_request_drawer.description: Describe la función que te gustaría ver en Calorel.
new_request_drawer.title_placeholder: Ej: Añadir integración con Apple Health
new_request_drawer.desc_placeholder: Explica por qué es importante esta función y cómo debería funcionar.

toasts.delete_success_desc: Tu cuenta y todos los datos asociados han sido eliminados permanentemente.
